title: The REAL Cost of Getting Rid of Fossil Fuels | Guest: Rep. Chris Stewart | 9/30/22
description:
A transgender Army officer and wife have been charged with plotting to leak medical records to Russia, and the media struggled with the framing of the story. Glenn elaborates on the issue of getting rid of drilling and how that will affect the price and availability of standard everyday products. Rep. Chris Stewart explains what's going on with Russia's Nord Stream pipelines. Bill O'Reilly joins to discuss the week's biggest news, including President Biden's latest senior moment, the upcoming midterms, and his newest book, "Killing the Legends." Author Michael Malice discusses the possibility of a Gavin Newsom/Kamala Harris face-off in 2024 and what's happening with the Nord Stream pipelines. Stu shares with Glenn the COVID relief fraud that went down in America and those who benefited from it.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
